remarks: Bounded induction (principle of induction when ` A ` is assumed to be bounded), proved from basic constructive axioms.  See ~ find for a nonconstructive proof of the general case.  See ~ findset for a proof when ` A ` is assumed to be a set.  (Contributed by BJ, 22-Nov-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bdfind.bd $e |- Bdd_ A $.
bdfind $p |- ( ( A C_ _om /\ (/) e. A /\ A. x e. A suc x e. A ) -> A = _om ) $.
$d A x $.
